column.head: select %s from %s limit %d;
column.sample: select %s from %s order by random() limit %d;

table.head: select * from %s limit %d;
table.sample: select * from %s order by random() limit %d;

system.schema_no_system: select table_name, column_name, data_type from tmp_dbpy_schema;
system.schema_with_system: select table_name, column_name, data_type from tmp_dbpy_schema;
system.foreign_keys_for_table:
select
                column_name
                , foreign_table as foreign_table_name
                , foreign_column as foreign_colum_name
            from
                tmp_dbpy_foreign_keys
            where
                table_name = '%s';
system.foreign_keys_for_column:
select
                column_name
                , foreign_table as foreign_table_name
                , foreign_column as foreign_colum_name
            from
                tmp_dbpy_foreign_keys
            where
                table_name = '%s' and column_name = '%s';
system.ref_keys_for_table:
select
                 foreign_column
                 , table_name
                 , column_name
            from
                tmp_dbpy_foreign_keys
            where
                foreign_table = '%s';
